title: Episode 253: Tradeoffs, Lockdowns, Climate Change, and Free Stuff
itunes:title: Episode 253: Tradeoffs, Lockdowns, Climate Change, and Free Stuff
description:
What do climate change, the covid lockdowns, taxing billionaires, free college, and free healthcare have in common? In each case, politicians would prefer that voters ignore the reality of tradeoffs.
